"Yes, let's go." Inzola said to Wrath...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 22,=
 2000 4:53 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Wrath: We could try jungle?=
 *Wrath asks Deemos*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
 =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:39 AM
    Su=
bject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "It's up to you where we start." Deemos sai=
d to Wrath...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizar=
ds 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:27 =
AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Wrath nods and smiles* Wrath:=
 Where should start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
        ----- Original =
Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
   Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast War=
s


        "Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone already, but sure, we'=
ll come." Inzola said.

        "Good to practice with our new beast modes.=
" Deemos said. He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

        "Those Alliance an=
d Preds will be sorry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looke=
d at Wrath.

        "The Maximals, most of them just don't got it, but a f=
ew stand out, you are one of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
          =
----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
     =
     Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well....=
..We can go scouting...hmm....I've haven't had much to do...We go hunting? =
*Wrath asks Deemos and Inzola*
            ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
          From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Se=
nt: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars=



            Inzola smiles and shakes Wrath's hand.

            "Nice to=
 meet such a charming and powerful bot upon my repair." Inzola said. Deemos=
 and Inzola hugged for about 5 seconds and then looked back to Wrath.

    =
        "So, what are we supposed to do right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...
 =
             ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: iloveallliza=
rds 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, Ju=
ly 22, 2000 12:53 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          =
    Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke about. A=
 pleasure to meet you. *Wrath extends his hand for a hand shake*
          =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
        =
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, July 22, 20=
00 12:20 AM
                Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                Deemo=
s looked at the CR Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked aroun=
d.

                "Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. D=
eemos laughed.

                "Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

       =
         Gangon's spark is still waiting.

                Artist runs arou=
nd in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exercises him. He runs=
 away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into the mountain an=
d an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pass through his=
 mind. Hours later, he awakes.

                "Oh, that was some blow, bu=
t I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

                "Plintissa? Where a=
re you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remembered=
 that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, so he =
ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

                "Plin=
tissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist said. Pli=
ntissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laughed and t=
hey kissed. After the kiss.

                "Do me a favor, Artist, stop u=
sing rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

                "Okay, I won=
't rhyme, we'll have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and=
 Artist took Plintissa to a grassy plain.

                Dracona held up =
her scanning device in front of Scorponok's face.

                "I can f=
ind that device I lost." Dracona said.

                "Then I'll give it =
to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice gun." Dracona sa=
id. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis s=
tared at her, mouths agape.

                The Radicons sat there still..=
.
